name: Guardian of Immortal Mountain(仙山守卫者)
description: Guardian of Immortal Mountain is a action game of protect animals in immortal mountain, now it 's only contain chapter 5, 1-4 chapter will continue to publish.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 (AMD FX 8350) or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or better 4GB VRam or more Storage: 800 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i7 or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050Ti or better 8GB VRam or more Storage: 2 GB available space
